thank you - dankeschön - gracias - obrigado - merci

for hosting, feeding, following, cheering-up, cooking, supporting, sharing this great adventure, wherever close or far, mentally, physically or financially.

  • Warmshowers & hosts
    • Raul, Carlos, Pedro, Ander & Family, Jeanne, Manu, Jarvis, Claire & Rodrigue, Etienne from Montbéliard and Etienne from Belfort, Joel, Raphael, Alexia & Arthur, Christophe & Susan, Sophie, Konrad, Roberto. I had the chance to meet most of them through the App/Website Warmshowers. I was astonished by their generosity and feel like I do have a big debt towards them.
  • The Rider's team
    • Solenne, Charlotte, Catherine (I am nice to mention you here...), Pierre-Jacques and Dennis who joined me on the road for one day or one week.
  • IT support
    • from Le Wagon which provides me access to their online tutorials. They tought me how to realize this website. If you ever want to learn code, html, css, java and more, you should have a look!
